items.title: Targeted Nutrients for Optimal Mental Performance
items.content: Mental and physical health are closely connected. That’s why tadm Brain combines carefully selected ingredients to ensure optimal nutrient absorption. Omega-3 fatty acids like DHA and EPA are essential for neuronal communication and the structural integrity of brain cells. Antioxidants such as vitamin E protect cells from oxidative stress, while anti-inflammatory compounds contribute to long-term cognitive performance.

items.title: Structure and Function of Brain Cells
items.content: Omega-3 fatty acids (DHA & EPA) from algae oil – Building blocks of cell membranes, improve signal transmission between neurons, and enhance neuronal function. Omega-9 fatty acids from walnut and black seed oil – Promote oxygen supply to the brain and energy production in neurons. Phytosterols from walnut and hemp oil – Support cell membrane stability and facilitate efficient nutrient absorption. Thymoquinone & Omega-6 fatty acids (GLA) – Enhance effective neuronal communication.

items.title: Protection and Regeneration of the Nervous System
items.content: Vitamin E (D-Alpha-Tocopherol) – Protects brain cells from oxidative stress and helps maintain cognitive function. Polyphenols and antioxidants from black seed and walnut oil – Reduce oxidative damage in brain cells and support neuronal regeneration. Thymoquinone from black seed oil – Promotes cell regeneration, stabilizes neurons, and strengthens the immune system. Omega-6 fatty acids (Gamma-Linolenic Acid, GLA) from hemp oil – Reduce inflammation in the brain and support the structural integrity of nerve cells.

items.title: Immune System, Anti-Inflammatory Action, and Neuronal Communication
items.content: Thymoquinone from black seed oil – Reduces inflammation and supports the body's immune defense. Omega-6 fatty acids (GLA) from hemp oil – Regulate immune responses and help reduce inflammation throughout the body. Vitamin E and polyphenols – Protect immune cells from oxidative stress and contribute to overall cellular health. Phytosterols from walnut and hemp oil – Promote synaptic plasticity and enhance the brain's adaptability.

items.title: Optimal Nutrient Absorption for Maximum Mental Performance
items.content: All oils are gently cold-pressed to preserve their valuable nutrients and ensure high bioavailability. Taste- and odor-neutral, the vegan softgels integrate effortlessly into daily routines. With high bioavailability, the essential nutrients reach the brain, immune system, and cells precisely where they are needed. tadm Brain provides your brain with essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and anti-inflammatory nutrients to support neuronal function, mental clarity, and long-term immune health.

items.title: Effective Softgels for an Effortless Routine
items.content:
tadm Brain utilizes 100% vegan softcaps, manufactured under the strictest quality standards in a GMP-certified facility in Germany. Production adheres to EU and US regulations and is continuously monitored by qualified experts. Certifications such as DIN EN ISO 9001 & HACCP ensure the highest purity and safety at every stage of production.

With a controlled release profile, these softcaps maximize bioavailability, allowing your body to absorb essential nutrients efficiently. Additionally, Vitamin E stabilizes the high-quality oils, prevents oxidation, and acts as a potent antioxidant for cellular protection.

Consistency is key to long-term success. That’s why tadm Brain softcaps are designed to be soft, easy to swallow, and completely odorless and tasteless—ensuring effortless integration into your daily routine.

items.title: Uncompromising Quality Through Advanced Technology
items.content: We leverage cutting-edge technology and precision machinery to maintain consistent, high-quality standards. From the careful selection of raw materials to a rigorously controlled manufacturing process, we prioritize purity and effectiveness—delivering a product you can trust.

items.title: Your Benefits at a Glance
items: Compliant with all EU & US regulations
Odorless & tasteless for seamless daily use

items.title: What is Walnut Oil?
items.content:
Walnut oil is extracted from the ripe nuts of the Juglans regia tree and has been valued for centuries. Modern research confirms its benefits for the cardiovascular system, cognitive function, and eye health.

Rich in Omega-3 fatty acids and Vitamin E, walnut oil has anti-inflammatory properties, promotes brain function, and strengthens the cardiovascular system. Additionally, it may reduce the risk of chronic eye diseases.

items.title: Where Does Our Walnut Oil Come From?
items.content: Our high-quality walnut oil comes from sustainably managed farms, where walnuts are carefully selected and gently cold-pressed to preserve all valuable nutrients. The production follows the highest international quality standards and complies with current EU food safety regulations. Its environmentally friendly extraction supports sustainability and conserves natural resources.

items.title: Why Walnut Oil?
items.content:
Rich in Omega-3 fatty acids and antioxidants, walnut oil supports the cardiovascular system, reduces inflammation, and enhances cognitive function.

Its unique fatty acid profile and sustainable extraction make walnut oil the optimal choice for holistic well-being.

Our carefully balanced formulation combines walnut oil with other valuable ingredients to enhance mental performance, ensure cellular protection, and support eye health.

items.title: What is Hemp Oil?
items.content:
Hemp oil is extracted from the seeds of the hemp plant (*Cannabis sativa*) and is a rich source of essential Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids. Since the body cannot produce these on its own, they are vital for a balanced diet.

Particularly, gamma-linolenic acid (GLA), a rare anti-inflammatory Omega-6 fatty acid, supports the nervous system, brain function, and skin health.

Thanks to its optimal Omega-6 to Omega-3 ratio of approximately 3:1, hemp oil contributes to overall health.

items.title: Where Does Our Hemp Oil Come From?
items.content:
Our high-quality hemp oil is extracted from carefully selected hemp seeds using gentle cold pressing to preserve all valuable nutrients.

Hemp plants grow quickly, require minimal water, and thrive without pesticides – a natural advantage for both people and the environment. Our production meets the highest international quality standards and complies with the latest EU food safety regulations.

items.title: Why We Choose Hemp Oil
items.content:
Rich in Omega fatty acids and gamma-linolenic acid (GLA), hemp oil supports the nervous system, cognitive function, and immune system.

Its balanced fatty acid profile and sustainable production make hemp oil the optimal choice for holistic well-being and peak mental performance.

Our precisely balanced formula combines hemp oil with other valuable nutrients to enhance mental clarity, support neural processes, and promote overall well-being.

items.title: What is Algae Oil?
items.content: Algae are the original source of Omega-3 fatty acids and the only vegan source of Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) and Eicosapentaenoic Acid (EPA). Since the body cannot synthesize DHA and EPA on its own, they must be obtained through diet. As essential components of cell membranes, they are indispensable for the function of the brain, inflammatory metabolism, immune system, and nervous system.

items.title: Where Does Our Algae Oil Come From?
items.content:
Our high-quality algae oil is derived from the microalgae Schizochytrium and produced in a Swiss facility following the highest international standards – in compliance with EU and US food regulations.

By cultivating it in artificial seawater, the oil remains free from heavy metals and microplastics. Fermentation increases the Omega-3 content, and the fatty acids are then purified through gentle centrifugation and advanced filtration, ensuring the highest purity and bioavailability.

items.title: Why Algae Oil?
items.content:
Algae oil provides high-quality, long-chain Omega-3 fatty acids (DHA & EPA), which are essential for the brain, nerve cells, and cell regeneration. DHA is a key structural component of brain, nerve, and retinal cells. It enhances membrane fluidity and signal transmission, which is crucial for cognitive function, vision, and cardiovascular health.

EPA helps regulate inflammatory processes and supports a balanced immune function. This fatty acid plays a role in the production of signaling molecules that reduce inflammation and contribute to immune system stability.

Instead of obtaining Omega-3 through fish, we source it directly from algae, preserving marine resources and avoiding contaminants like heavy metals. Our innovative and carefully balanced formulation combines algae oil with valuable nutrients to support long-term mental performance and overall well-being.

items.title: What is Black Cumin?
items.content:
For over 2,000 years, black seed oil, extracted from the seeds of Nigella sativa, has been valued as a medicinal plant. Modern research confirms its numerous benefits, particularly for the immune system and brain function. Its key active compound, thymoquinone, has anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, and antiviral properties. Studies show that it supports the immune system, protects brain cells from oxidative stress, and enhances neuronal function.

Sustainable Cultivation: Black seed thrives in arid climates with minimal water consumption, making it a particularly environmentally friendly crop.

items.title: Where Does Our Black Seed Oil Come From?
items.content: Our organic black seed oil is sourced from Egypt and undergoes gentle cold extraction in Germany. It then undergoes bland filtration, which removes unwanted particles while preserving its valuable bioactive compounds. The production meets international quality standards and complies with the latest EU and US food safety regulations.

items.title: Why We Use Black Seed Oil
items.content:
Rich in Omega-6 fatty acids (linoleic acid) and antioxidants (thymoquinone), black seed oil offers anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, and antiviral benefits, strengthens the immune system, and supports brain health.

In our unique formulation, black seed oil works in synergy with other high-quality ingredients to enhance cognitive performance, promote mental clarity, and support overall well-being.

cumin.title: Black seed oil
cumin.content: Black seed oil provides thymoquinone, a powerful antioxidant, along with omega-6 fatty acids. In our unique formulation, it delivers antibacterial and antiviral effects, protects cells from oxidative stress, strengthens the immune system, and supports brain function.

algae_oil.title: Algae Oil
algae_oil.content: Our algae oil is the original vegan source of the essential omega-3 fatty acids docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) and eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA). It supports cell structures, the immune system, and the health of the brain and eyes – sustainably sourced and free from contaminants.

hemp_oil.title: Hemp Oil
hemp_oil.content: Hemp oil is a natural source of omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids. In our unique combination, it delivers anti-inflammatory gamma-linolenic acid (GLA). It supports brain function, strengthens the immune system, and promotes skin health.

walnut_oil.title: Walnut Oil
walnut_oil.content: Walnut oil is a natural source of omega-3 fatty acids and vitamin E. It supports brain function, protects cells from oxidative stress, promotes cardiovascular health, helps regulate cholesterol levels, and supports eye health.

softgels.title: tadm Brain Softgels
softgels.content: tadm Brain uses 100% vegan softgels, produced under GMP-certified conditions according to EU and US standards. Controlled release maximizes bioavailability, while vitamin E stabilizes the oils. Soft, easy to swallow, flavorless, and perfect for your success routine.

list.designation: World-Class BJJ Athlete (BJJ & Judo Black Belt – World Championship Medalist)

For over a decade, I’ve been at the top of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu in Finland, competing successfully against the strongest fighters in Europe and around the world. In this sport, strength and technique alone aren’t enough — every move must be precise and strategic. Like chess, foresight determines victory or defeat.

That’s why tadm Brain is an essential part of my routine. Its essential nutrients support my brain and immune system, keeping me focused, resilient, and ready to perform at the highest level. In a sport where milliseconds make the difference, this support is indispensable.

No matter where I train or compete — tadm Brain is always with me.

list.designation: Specialist in Orthopedics and Surgery – Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Munich
list.quote: As a specialist in a hospital, I work under constant pressure. Long shifts, emergencies, and quick decisions demand full concentration—exhaustion is not an option. Yet, in a stressful daily routine, there is little time for a balanced diet that supports focus and resilience. tadm Brain helps me bridge this gap. Essential fatty acids and anti-inflammatory ingredients provide my body with targeted support. Since taking it daily, I feel more alert, focused, and balanced—a noticeable advantage in my demanding profession.

list.name: Ahmad Dudarov
list.quote: Als Profisportler auf Weltniveau vertrete ich Deutschland. Um 100 Prozent Leistung abzurufen, braucht mein Körper mehr als hartes Training – eine starke Immunabwehr und volle mentale Klarheit. Mit tadm bleibe ich gesund, fühle mich kraftvoller und fokussierter auf der Matte. Früher war es eine Herausforderung, meinen Körper konstant mit essenziellen Fettsäuren zu versorgen. Jetzt geht es einfach: tadm ist immer dabei – handlich, minimalistisch und unverzichtbar auf meinem Weg zu neuen Medaillen.

list.name: Mergim Tahiri
list.designation: CEO of Tahiri Garden and Landscaping
list.quote: As a CEO, I need to perform at my best—both physically and mentally—every single day. Long working hours often drained my energy and focus until I discovered tadm Brain. With its essential fatty acids, tadm Brain helps me stay energized throughout the day and remain sharp even in the evening. An investment in my health that pays off every day!

list.questions: Quality and Precision – Made in Germany
content: Our production takes place under the highest quality assurance standards in a GMP-certified facility in Germany.
In addition to meeting EU and US regulations, our production also complies with DIN EN ISO 9001 and HACCP quality standards and is carefully monitored and controlled by skilled personnel.
We use state-of-the-art technology and machinery to meet the highest quality standards and fulfill the expectations of our customers.

list.questions: Careful Selection of Premium Raw Materials
content: Our raw materials are carefully selected and sourced exclusively from trusted suppliers to ensure the highest quality and purity of our products.
All oils used are cold-pressed to retain their nutrients as effectively as possible.
By using high-quality raw materials and ideal blending ratios, we ensure that our products provide optimal bioavailability of active ingredients for maximum effectiveness.
In collaboration with leading laboratories and scientists in Munich, we have developed a combination of premium essential fatty acids with ingredients that support each other synergistically.
Our 100% vegan softgels feature a controlled release profile that allows optimal absorption of the active ingredients.
Our team of experts and scientists stays at the forefront of research while also relying on proven, scientifically validated ingredients.
Our products are 100% vegan – out of responsibility for people and the planet.
We use glass and recyclable materials for our packaging to conserve resources.
We promote sustainable production processes and responsibly source our raw materials to keep our ecological footprint as small as possible.

list.question: What is tadm Brain and who is it suitable for?
list.answer: tadm Brain is a high-quality, vegan dietary supplement containing a synergistic combination of black cumin oil, DHA-rich algae oil, walnut oil, and hemp oil. It was developed to support cognitive performance, mental clarity, and holistic health. tadm Brain is suitable for adults who want to sustainably improve their mental and physical performance.

list.question: What ingredients are in tadm Brain?
list.answer: tadm Brain contains a well-thought-out combination of four cold-pressed oils: Black cumin oil (Nigella sativa) – known for its immune-strengthening and anti-inflammatory properties. DHA-rich algae oil (Schizochytrium sp.) – a vegan source of omega-3 fatty acids (DHA & EPA) to support brain and nervous system health. Walnut oil (Juglans regia) – rich in omega-3 and antioxidants like vitamin E, it promotes heart and brain health. Hemp oil (Cannabis sativa) – with an ideal ratio of omega-6 to omega-3 (3:1) as well as gamma-linolenic acid (GLA) to support the immune system and skin health. The softgel shell consists of water, modified starch, and glycerin and is 100% vegan.

list.question: What health benefits does tadm Brain offer?
list.answer:
The ingredients of tadm Brain have been carefully selected to: 
✅ Support mental performance and concentration 
✅ Supply brain and nerve cells with essential omega-3 fatty acids 
✅ Strengthen the immune system and regulate inflammation in the body 
✅ Promote heart health through omega-3 fatty acids from algae and walnut oil 
✅ Support skin health and cell regeneration through hemp oil and antioxidants

list.question: Why does tadm Brain combine different oils in one formula?
list.answer: Our synergistic combination maximizes the bioavailability and effectiveness of the individual ingredients. The oils complement each other in their effects and ensure optimal supply of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and anti-inflammatory agents.

list.question: How do I take tadm Brain?
list.answer: The recommended daily dose is 4 softgels per day, divided into two intakes (2 softgels each with meals) with sufficient liquid.

list.question: How long should I take tadm Brain to see results?
list.answer: Dietary supplements work over the long term. Initial positive effects may become noticeable after a few weeks, but optimal support for the body occurs over a longer period. For sustainable results, we recommend continuous intake over several months.

list.question: Is tadm Brain suitable for vegans and vegetarians?
list.answer: Yes! tadm Brain is 100% vegan. It contains exclusively plant-based ingredients, including the softgel shell.

list.question: Does tadm Brain contain allergens?
list.answer: The product contains walnut oil and may contain traces of walnuts. People with nut allergies should consult their doctor before taking it.

list.question: Are there side effects when taking tadm Brain?
list.answer: tadm Brain is a natural product without artificial additives. In rare cases, sensitive individuals may experience stomach discomfort. People taking blood-thinning medications or suffering from pre-existing conditions should consult a doctor before taking it.

list.question: Why does tadm Brain use algae oil instead of fish oil?
list.answer:
Algae oil is the original source of omega-3 fatty acids and contains high concentrations of DHA and EPA. Unlike fish oil, algae oil is: 
✅ Vegan & sustainable – no overfishing or ocean pollution 
✅ Free from contaminants – free of heavy metals, microplastics, or environmental toxins 
✅ More efficient – obtained directly from the source, without going through fish

list.question: Where is tadm Brain manufactured?
list.answer: tadm Brain is manufactured in a GMP-certified production facility in Germany under the highest quality standards. It meets the requirements of DIN EN ISO 9001, HACCP, and other strict food regulations.

list.question: How should I store tadm Brain?
list.answer: Store the product unopened, in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep it out of reach of children.

list.question: Can I take tadm Brain during pregnancy or breastfeeding?
list.answer: Pregnant and breastfeeding women should consult their doctor before taking tadm Brain.

list.question: Is it possible to return tadm Brain?
list.answer: According to § 312g Abs. 2 Nr. 3 BGB (German Civil Code), returns are excluded if the packaging seal has been removed after delivery, as it is a hygienically sensitive product.

list.question: Can I combine tadm Brain with other dietary supplements?
list.answer: Yes, tadm Brain can be combined with other dietary supplements. However, make sure not to exceed the recommended daily amount of omega-3 fatty acids. If you are already taking other omega-3 or vitamin E supplements, it is advisable to consult with your doctor.

list.question: What sets tadm Brain apart from other omega-3 products?
list.answer:
tadm Brain is not a simple omega-3 capsule – it combines four high-quality, cold-pressed oils in a unique formula specifically tailored for cognitive performance and holistic health. Unlike conventional omega-3 supplements, tadm Brain offers: 
✅ A synergistic combination of black cumin oil, DHA-rich algae oil, walnut oil, and hemp oil 
✅ A 100% vegan, contaminant-free, and sustainable source of omega-3, omega-6, and omega-9 
✅ Highest quality – manufactured in Germany under GMP and ISO standards

list.question: What role does Vitamin E play in tadm Brain?
list.answer: Vitamin E (D-alpha-tocopherol) is used as a natural antioxidant to protect the sensitive fatty acids from oxidation. It also contributes to cell preservation by reducing oxidative stress and stabilizing cell membranes.

list.question: Can tadm Brain improve my memory?
list.answer: Yes, the fatty acids contained, especially DHA from algae oil, play a crucial role in brain function. DHA is a main component of brain cells and contributes to the maintenance of normal cognitive function. Long-term DHA intake can positively influence memory performance, concentration, and mental clarity.

list.question: Why does tadm Brain contain both omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids?
list.answer:
Not all omega-6 fatty acids are the same. While conventional Western diets often contain an unbalanced ratio of omega-6 to omega-3, tadm Brain exclusively uses high-quality, inflammation-regulating omega-6, mostly from black cumin oil. Why is this important? 
- Black cumin oil contains thymoquinone, which has proven anti-inflammatory properties and supports the immune system. 
- Omega-6 fatty acids from natural sources like black cumin oil and hemp oil play an important role in cell regeneration and hormone production, without the negative effects of refined omega-6 from industrially processed foods. 
- The carefully balanced ratio of omega-3 and omega-6 in tadm Brain promotes a healthy balance in the body by specifically regulating inflammation rather than promoting it. 
With tadm Brain, you're only consuming high-quality omega-6 that specifically supports your body – without the risk of an unbalanced fatty acid ratio.
